verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
O the land
of cloudless day,
O the land
of an uncloudy day.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
O they tell me of a home
where no storm-clouds rise,
O they tell me
of an uncloudy day.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O they tell me of a home
far beyond the skies,
O they tell me of a home
far away;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
O they tell me of a home
where no storm clouds rise;
O they tell me
of an uncloudy day.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
O they tell me of a home
where my friends have gone,
O they tell me
of that land far away,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Where the tree of life
in eternal bloom
Sheds its fragrance
thro' the uncloudy day.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O they tell me of a King
in His beauty there,
And they tell me
that mine eyes shall behold

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Where He sits on the throne
that is whiter than snow,
In the city
that is made of gold.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
O they tell me
that He smiles on His children there,
And His smile
drives their sorrows all away;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
And they tell me
that no tears ever come again,
In that lovely land
of uncloudy day.
